settings.heading: What is your return policy?
settings.row_content: We offer a 30-day hassle-free return policy. If you’re not completely satisfied with your purchase, simply contact us to initiate a return or exchange. Items must be unused, with tags attached, and in their original packaging.

settings.heading: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.row_content: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. Our checkout is secure and encrypted for your safety.

settings.heading: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
settings.row_content: If you need to make changes or cancel your order, please contact us within 12 hours of placing it. Once the order is processed, modifications may not be possible.

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.row_content: Yes, we ship to many countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times for international orders are calculated at checkout.

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. Shipping times vary based on your location, but most customers receive their orders within 5-7 business days. Expedited shipping options are also available at checkout.

settings.heading: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.row_content: Yes! We provide free shipping on all orders over $50. For orders below $50, standard shipping rates apply.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! Once your order is shipped, you’ll receive a tracking number via email. Use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier’s website.

settings.heading: How do I find my size?
settings.row_content: We include a detailed size guide on each product page. For additional help, check out our "How to Measure" guide or contact us—we’re happy to assist!
